content:
new to RocLang, thought I'd try it out!

I'm following the instructions for installing Roc on an M1 mac, which points me to the repo's releases. However, the release it points me to was made on a commit from 2 years ago:

Screenshot-2023-10-14-at-23.17.04.png

Clearly from the chat activity this project isn't dead... is there a more recent release somewhere else?
It is the correct one, but I think the nightly process just uploads to the same release.
If you expand the assets you should see the latest was about 4 days ago.

OOOOH the assets are updated! (I assume that's to keep updated assets at the same url?)

got it, thanks!
